snippet: About 20 pilgrims were injured when a mob tried to force its way through a line of tens of thousands at a Hindu festival in the state of Jharkhand, a police official said.
abstract: Stampede outside temple in Jharkhand State, India, leaves 10 pilgrims dead; incident occurs after large mob attempted to force its way through tens of thousands of people gathered for Hindu religious festival.
lead_paragraph: About 20 pilgrims were injured when a mob tried to force its way through a line of tens of thousands at a Hindu festival in the state of Jharkhand, a police official said.

headline.main: Stampede in India Kills 10 Pilgrims Attending Hindu Festival
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; India: 10 Die in Temple Stampede
